title: The Girls and daddy
creator_credit: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
brief_description: Melodrama by D.W. Griffith about two young ladies and a burglar. The film is presented in two parts: first, the scenes in the order in which they were photographed, and then as edited. The first part is silent, and the second has a musical accompaniment. Cast includes David Miles, Florence Lawrence, Dorothy West, Mack Sennett.
